start: ^Hello and good afternoon. Anything I can do to help you? If you need to go to school, its just over there.
^You know where the road behind you leads?
^Do you ever feel stressed while working?
^Do you know how I can destress myself?
choice_1: ^The road behind me leads to the library.
^Reading is my favorite hobby and it helps me. It also makes me smarter too and better prepared to deal with any stressors.
choice_2: ^One of the four parts of the Bilog ng Buhay is 'Kabuluhan', where you think of why you are experiencing hardship.
^In 'Kabuluhan', I just remind myself that the stress and hardship I experience are for the safety of my community.
^That way, the people I love are safe.
^So if you ever feel stressed, ask yourself why you are experiencing it and for what goal.
^If you find your goal worthwhile, you can endure the stress you experience.
choice_3: ^Have you tried taking breathing exercises? They are useful in reducing stress.
^You can also hang out with your friends. Spending time with friends helps reduce stress.
